com.camerontec.catalys.server.ha.collections.distributed

Class ReplicatorClusterState

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.server.ha.collections.distributed.ReplicatorClusterState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IReplicatorClusterState, Iterable<ClusterNode>

    public final class ReplicatorClusterState
extends Object
implements IReplicatorClusterState
    Class encapsulating the cluster state relevant to the Replicator.

    This class is thread safe.
